title: LITRO says no supply after today’s distribution
body_lines: The LITRO Gas Lanka Ltd today said that they will not supply gas until further notice due to shortage and urgeed people not to wait in queues, a LITRO official said.
After releasing 16,000 gas cylinders today, the gas distribution will resume upon a shipment is brought.
A senior official said gas cylinder distribution will resume most likely next Tuesday (7).
